ygData.subject: Re: starting stats
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t think there is a right answer on attribute points.  I put most of mine in str and wish I had more. =)  But now that I m lvl 32, I wish I had more int
ygData.messageBody:
I don't think there is a right answer on attribute points. I put most of
mine in str and wish I had more. =) But now that I'm lvl 32, I wish I had
more int and cha.

As for best race, imho it's the half-elf. But then, I've played a female
half-elf bard since 2d week of P4, so I'm a bit biased. Cantador, the 36th
lvl bard on MithMarr also states that the half-elf is the best bard (he runs
a male HE bard). Lots of people choose female woodelf, but I think that's
just for the kawaii (er... cuteness). =)



>From: El Gato Frito <fire3@...>
>
>what does everyone think is the best places to put the
>extra attribute points into? also, what is the best race
>for a bard?
>thanks
>Rasmussen, monk of the 6th chamber
>soon to be a bard as well ;)
